text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the client's copyright is automatically protected in Italy *partially because of the WTO TRIPS Agreement*. The response correctly states that US works enjoy automatic protection in Italy because Italy adheres to the Berne Convention. While TRIPS builds upon Berne and mandates minimum standards, the response explicitly cites the Berne Convention as the basis for automatic protection, not TRIPS, thus failing to meet the specific requirement of the criterion.", "criterion_id": "8697740c-bd3f-4e2f-86ab-713911767723"}
